What I Do

At the moment I'm studying for my bachelor's degree in Eletrical Engineering.

More About Me

Ewout is a 19 years young student living in the Netherlands. From 2018 till 2022 he is studying for his bachelor's degree electrical engineering at Windesheim Zwolle. Ewout spends 6 hours a week solving computer problems for his part time job at Uw Computerstudent.

Some of my past projects

Custom build of dwm
(Jun 2020 ~ Aug 2020)

Dwm stands for Dynamic Window Manager, it is designed by the developers from Suckless.org It was created for GNU based operating systems, like Linux but it is also used on BSD. This is why I decided to develop my own version of dwm.

Read More
Monitoring System
(Sep 2019 ~ Jul 2020)

Monitoring system created by the Blue Racing Team. We created this system for the Shell Eco Marathon of 2020. This is a race where teams of students from many schools in Europe participate in, with custom build electric vehicles.

Read More
Sumo Robot
(Jan 2019 ~ Jun 2019)

The DriveXchange Project is a sumo robot tournament for first year students electrical engineering at Windesheim. Here we (a team of 20 electrical & mechanical engineering students) designed 4 robots to compete in a race against other teams.
